delete.title: Delete collection
delete.description: Are you sure you want to delete the selected collection?

noCollection.title: No collection selected
noCollection.description: Select a collection from the list to view.

empty.title: No jobs found
empty.description: Start by uploading a zip file or scraping a website

newCollection.title: Create new collection
newCollection.description: Create a new collection to use with RAG.

name.label: Collection name
name.placeholder: Enter a unique name for the collection
name.error: Another collection with the same name already exists.

chunkSize.label: Chunk size
chunkSize.description: Documents which are indexed are split into chunks, each containing the configured number of tokens. Too small a chunk size can cause the model to miss out on relevant information and too large a chunk size can lead to the model not being able to pay attention to the correct context. Default value is {{chunkSize}}.
chunkSize.placeholder: Size of the chunks to split documents into

overlap.label: Overlap
overlap.description: Adding an overlap between consecutive chunks increases the possibility that each chunk contains all the relevant context that it needs. Default value is {{overlap}}.
overlap.error: Cannot be more than {{chunkSize}} (half of chunk size)

contentAware.label: Content aware chunking
contentAware.description: Enabling Content-aware chunking, will cause the system to attempt to split chunks so that sentences fully fit within the chunks. If the sentences are short relative to the chunk size, we will try to fit multiple sentences in a chunk.

errors.uniqueName: Failed to check if collection name is unique.

deleteDocuments.title: Delete documents
deleteDocuments.description: Are you sure you want to delete the selected documents?

scrapeWebsite.title: Scrape website
scrapeWebsite.subTitle: Scrape a website with URL
scrapeWebsite.description: Submit a job to scrape the contents of a website and insert them into the selected collection. Every link present within each scraped page is also processed, as long as it starts with URL provided to begin scraping from.

messages.failed: Failed to start scrape website job

uploadZip.title: Upload
uploadZip.subTitle: Upload files to collection: {{collectionName}}
uploadZip.helpText: You can upload up to {{maxFiles}} files (max 200 MB each) in txt, pdf, pptx, ppt, docx, or doc formats. Alternatively, upload one ZIP file (up to 1GB), with individual files limited to 200 MB.

host.label: Host prefix for files within zip file (optional)
host.placeholder: Type a host prefix here to use for citations for files..

errors.activeJob: There is already an active job for this collection. Please wait for it to complete before uploading a ZIP file.
errors.oneZipFile: Only one zip file can be uploaded at once.
errors.maxFiles: Maximum {{maxFiles}} files can be uploaded at once.
